title: Clicking enable in settings on a Link unfurl crashes the app

milestone.description:
Communities:
- Token Based Functionality

General:
- User Profile showcase

body:
# Bug Report

## Description

Click Enable in Settings here: 

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11926403/217877945-407e55f0-4cf7-4b77-a04f-9af9fdd85bbc.png)

causes the app to crash.

There is nothing useful in the logs:

```
INF 2023-02-09 11:35:26.046-05:00 shutting down...                           topics="status-app" tid=138952 file=nim_status_client.nim:144
DBG 2023-02-09 11:35:26.046-05:00 [threadpool] join thread                   topics="task-threadpool" tid=138965 file=threadpool.nim:256 threadid=6
DBG 2023-02-09 11:35:26.046-05:00 [threadpool] join thread                   topics="task-threadpool" tid=138965 file=threadpool.nim:256 threadid=7
DBG 2023-02-09 11:35:26.047-05:00 [threadpool] join thread                   topics="task-threadpool" tid=138965 file=threadpool.nim:256 threadid=8
DBG 2023-02-09 11:35:26.047-05:00 [threadpool] join thread                   topics="task-threadpool" tid=138965 file=threadpool.nim:256 threadid=9
DBG 2023-02-09 11:35:26.047-05:00 [threadpool] join thread                   topics="task-threadpool" tid=138965 file=threadpool.nim:256 threadid=10
DBG 2023-02-09 11:35:26.047-05:00 [threadpool] join thread                   topics="task-threadpool" tid=138965 file=threadpool.nim:256 threadid=11
DBG 2023-02-09 11:35:26.047-05:00 [threadpool] join thread                   topics="task-threadpool" tid=138965 file=threadpool.nim:256 threadid=12
DBG 2023-02-09 11:35:26.047-05:00 [threadpool] join thread                   topics="task-threadpool" tid=138965 file=threadpool.nim:256 threadid=13
DBG 2023-02-09 11:35:26.047-05:00 [threadpool] join thread                   topics="task-threadpool" tid=138965 file=threadpool.nim:256 threadid=14
DBG 2023-02-09 11:35:26.047-05:00 [threadpool] join thread                   topics="task-threadpool" tid=138965 file=threadpool.nim:256 threadid=15
DBG 2023-02-09 11:35:26.047-05:00 [threadpool] join thread                   topics="task-threadpool" tid=138965 file=threadpool.nim:256 threadid=16
DBG 2023-02-09 11:35:26.047-05:00 [threadpool] join thread                   topics="task-threadpool" tid=138965 file=threadpool.nim:256 threadid=1
DBG 2023-02-09 11:35:26.047-05:00 [threadpool] join thread                   topics="task-threadpool" tid=138965 file=threadpool.nim:256 threadid=3
DBG 2023-02-09 11:35:26.047-05:00 [threadpool] join thread                   topics="task-threadpool" tid=138965 file=threadpool.nim:256 threadid=5
DBG 2023-02-09 11:35:26.047-05:00 [threadpool] join thread                   topics="task-threadpool" tid=138965 file=threadpool.nim:256 threadid=4
DBG 2023-02-09 11:35:26.047-05:00 [threadpool] join thread                   topics="task-threadpool" tid=138965 file=threadpool.nim:256 threadid=2
INF 2023-02-09 11:35:26.047-05:00 logging out...                             topics="app-controller" tid=138952 file=app_controller.nim:266
Fatal: Object 0x55c2882200c0 destroyed while one of its QML signal handlers is in progress.
Most likely the object was deleted synchronously (use QObject::deleteLater() instead), or the application is running a nested event loop.
This behavior is NOT supported!
qrc:/app/mainui/AppMain.qml:150: function() { [native code] } (:0, )
Traceback (most recent call last)
/home/jonathan/dev/status-desktop/src/nim_status_client.nim(180) nim_status_client
/home/jonathan/dev/status-desktop/src/nim_status_client.nim(154) mainProc
/home/jonathan/dev/status-desktop/src/app/boot/app_controller.nim(269) delete
/home/jonathan/dev/status-desktop/src/app/global/global_singleton.nim(67) delete
/home/jonathan/dev/status-desktop/vendor/nimqml/src/nimqml/private/qqmlapplicationengine.nim(40) delete
SIGABRT: Abnormal termination.
make: *** [Makefile:637: run-linux] Error 1
```
### Additional Information

- Status desktop version: master (`2004adafba816042752af204b1a5bfac8027e731`)
Seems like anything that sends you to the profile does that. Clicking `Edit Profile` in the My Profile popup did it too
Closing as I found out it doesn't happen in master bu only my own branch :facepalm:
